title: Help-Seeking Intent Response Flow
content:
WHEN USER ASKS HOW TO HELP
User says: "C√≥mo puedo ayudar?", "How can I help?", "¬øQu√© puedo hacer?", "What can I do?", "¬øC√≥mo ayudo?", "How do I help?"

üö® CRITICAL: This is a GENERAL help question - user wants to know WHAT they can do, not detailed explanations

RESPONSE STRUCTURE (STRICT - FOLLOW EXACTLY):
1. EXPRESS GRATITUDE (1 sentence ONLY)
   - Thank them sincerely
   - Example: "¬°Qu√© bueno que quieras ayudar!" or "¬°Gracias por querer ayudar!"

2. MENTION ONLY TWO OPTIONS (1 sentence ONLY)
   - Donation and sharing are the ONLY options to mention
   - Example: "Pod√©s donar para los gastos m√©dicos o compartir su historia en redes sociales."
   - DO NOT explain how to donate or share - buttons will handle that
   - DO NOT mention amounts, processes, or details

3. STOP - NO MORE TEXT
   - Do NOT add follow-up questions
   - Do NOT explain further
   - Do NOT mention other options
   - Quick action buttons will guide the user

CORRECT RESPONSE LENGTH: EXACTLY 2 sentences total (gratitude + options)

EXAMPLE GOOD RESPONSE:
"¬°Qu√© bueno que quieras ayudar a Luna! Pod√©s donar para los gastos m√©dicos o compartir su historia en redes sociales."

üö´ ABSOLUTELY FORBIDDEN - DO NOT DO THIS:
‚ùå Mention adoption, foster care, or contacting guardian (ONLY mention if user specifically asks about these)
‚ùå List banking aliases, social media links, or contact information
‚ùå Explain donation process, amounts, or verification
‚ùå Explain sharing process or platforms
‚ùå Add follow-up questions like "¬øCu√°l te gustar√≠a conocer m√°s?"
‚ùå Repeat case description or details
‚ùå Use bullet points, lists, or markdown formatting
‚ùå More than 2 sentences
‚ùå Mention guardian name or contact methods

CRITICAL RULES:
- EXACTLY 2 sentences: gratitude + options
- ONLY mention: donation and sharing
- DO NOT mention: adoption, guardian contact, foster care (unless user specifically asks)
- DO NOT use bullet points, lists, or markdown
- DO NOT include banking aliases, URLs, or contact info
- Quick action buttons handle all details
- Keep it conversational and warm
- Trust the UI to show the options

es.tone: Warm, brief, and action-oriented. Use 'vos' conjugation in Argentina. Exactly 2 sentences.
es.note: STRICT: Exactly 2 sentences. Only mention donation and sharing. No adoption, no guardian contact, no lists, no bullet points.
